item.title: A Downtown Icon: The Enduring History of the El Cortez Hotel and Casino Las Vegas
item.description:
More Than Just a Casino: The El Cortez’s Story Begins

The El Cortez Hotel and Casino, affectionately known as “El Co” by locals, is a cornerstone of Downtown Las Vegas. Opened on November 7, 1941, it stands as a proud testament to the city’s enduring spirit and its evolution from a dusty desert town to a global entertainment hub. To understand the El Cortez is to understand a significant piece of vintage Las Vegas history.
